Literales.SaleText: Por favor, rellena los datos para confirmar tu compra:
Literales.RefundText: Por favor, rellena los datos para proceder a la devolución:
Literales.DCCTableText: YOU HAVE A CHOICE OF PAYING IN EITHER
Literales.CommissionText:
Include {0}% MARK-UP over wholesale rate
Service and Exchange rate provided by {1} on {2:d}
Commision {3}%
Please, select which currency you wish to be billed in for this transaction:

Mensajes.Msg003: 'Falta dato obligatorio. No se introdujo nº de tarjeta'

Mensajes.Msg006: 'Error: La longitud del código de seguridad es incorrecta'

Mensajes.Msg033: 'Falta dato obligatorio. No se introdujo Cod. TPV Original o dato Incorrecto'
Mensajes.Msg034: 'Falta dato obligatorio. No se introdujo Fecha Oper. Original o dato Incorrecto'
Mensajes.Msg035: 'Falta dato obligatorio. No se introdujo Num. Oper. Original o dato Incorrecto'

Literales.CardDataTable: Please enter your credit card details below
Literales.DCCTableText: YOU HAVE A CHOICE OF PAYING IN EITHER
Literales.CommissionText:
Include {0}% MARK-UP over wholesale rate
Service and Exchange rate provided by {1} on {2:d}
Commision {3}%
Please, select which currency you wish to be billed in for this transaction:

Mensajes.Msg001: 'The card number is incorrect. Please click Continue and re-enter your card number'
Mensajes.Msg002: 'Expiry date cannot be in the past. Please click Continue and correct the expiry date'
Mensajes.Msg003: 'The card number field cannot be left blank. Please click Continue and enter your card number.'
Mensajes.Msg004: 'The Security code field cannot be left blank. Please click Continue and enter your Security code in the box provided'
Mensajes.Msg005: 'Error: The length of the PAN is incorrect'
Mensajes.Msg006: 'Error: The length of the Security Code is incorrect'
Mensajes.Msg026: 'Please click Continue to process your payment or Cancel to amend your card details'
Mensajes.Msg027: 'Please click Exit to abandon this payment (your credit card will not be charged) or click Amend to amend your card details'
Mensajes.Msg032: 'Original Center Code cannot be left blank or the data is incorrect. Please click Continue and enter your center code.'
Mensajes.Msg033: 'Terminal Code cannot be left blank or the data is incorrect. Please click Continue and enter your terminal code.'
Mensajes.Msg034: 'Original Date cannot be left blank or the data is incorrect. Please click Continue and enter your original date.'
Mensajes.Msg035: 'Original Operation Number cannot be left blank or the data is incorrect. Please click Continue and enter your operation number.'
Mensajes.Msg040: 'IT IS NOT POSSIBLE REDIRECTING REQUEST TO HOST PROCESSOR PAGE...'
Mensajes.Msg043: 'IT IS NOT POSSIBLE REDIRECTING REQUEST TO CUSTOMER PAGE...'
